product_name: Wilderness Press San Francisco Peninsula Parklands Map
long_description: This color-coded map offers comprehensive coverage of the San Francisco Peninsula Parklands. Map features color-coded guide to national, state, county and city parks. Also highlights recreational activities such as cycling and swimming. Full description and contact information of each park is included. Map measures 8.5 x 3.75 inches folded; unfolds to 36 x 27.5 inches. Scale: one inch equals approximately two miles. Wilderness Press; copyright 2005.
short_description: This color-coded map offers comprehensive coverage of the San Francisco Peninsula Parklands.
